= Syntax =
- SQL is not case sensitive
- Some SQL require a semicolon after each statement

	== Basic Commands ==
	- SELECT:: Extract data
	- UPDATE:: Update data
	- DELETE:: Delete data
	- INSERT INTO:: Insert data into a database
	- CREATE DATABASE:: Create a new database
	- ALTER DATABASE:: Modify a database
	- CREATE TABLE:: Create a new table
	- ALTER TABLE:: Modigy a table
	- DROP TABLE:: Deleta a table
	- CREATE INDEX:: Create a search key
	- DROP INDEX:: Deleta a search key
